rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Creature tokens you control have haste and attack each combat if able.
{1}{W}: Transform Charging Commando. Activate only if two or more creatures that attacked this turn died under your control this turn.
rules_text2: At the beginning of combat on your turn, look at the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
